name: Gentlemen's Bar Fight Simulator
description:
NOTE: Due to limitations in (our own gamedev skills) and Construct, as of now, 25/09/2022, you can only play this game using 2 controllers in local co-op. Now that the game jam time limit is over, we will attempt to make it work on 1 keyboard (hopefully.)

Join the leaders of two opposing gangs in their legendary duel taking place inside the local bar.

Disassemble the bar and reassemble the peace. 

This game is a local multiplayer. You and your friend will play Benedict (the top-hatted gentleman)  and Rodger (gentlemanly demon) as their epic fight unfolds.
Your opponent has the ability to throw objects at you. Look out! For if all of your drink spills, you lose the brawl.

The game is accessible for color-blind people.

This game is part of the UNIVALI-XAMK international game jam 2022 September.
